articles.title: Reception given at DPRK Embassy in Beijing
articles.content:
Reception given at DPRK Embassy in Beijing 
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- A reception was given at the DPRK embassy in Beijing on Oct. 14 on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic ties between the DPRK and China.
					 Present there on invitation were Ismail Teliwardi, vice-chairman of the Standing Committee of the Chinese National People's Congress, the vice-president of the Xinhua News Agency, Wu Donghe, chairman of the China-Korea Friendship Association, the assistant to foreign minister, the assistant to the head of the International Liaison Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and other officials concerned.
					
					 Choe Jin Su, DPRK ambassador to China, and his embassy officials were present.
					
					 Choe Jin Su in his speech made at the reception said that the DPRK and China have dynamically pushed ahead with the cause of socialist construction, supporting and closely cooperating with each other since the establishment of diplomatic ties 60 years ago and made a positive contribution to defending the peace and security in the region and the rest of the world.
					
					 It is the invariable stand of the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK government to steadily consolidate and develop the DPRK-China friendship generation after generation, he said, adding:
					
					 The Korean people together with the Chinese comrades will make positive efforts to put the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries on a higher stage with the said anniversary and the "year of DPRK-China friendship" as a new starting point. 
					
					 Ismail Teliwardi in his speech said that the establishment of diplomatic ties between the two countries opened up a new chapter in the bilateral relations. The good neighborly, friendly and cooperative relations between China and the DPRK have steadily developed thanks to the care of the leaders of the two countries and the concerted efforts of both sides, he noted, and went on:
					
					 The Chinese party and government have always set store by the traditional Sino-DPRK friendship and considered it as their invariable line to steadily boost the good neighborly, friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries. The Chinese people together with the Korean comrades will sincerely implement the agreement reached between the leaders of the two countries and thus carry forward the Sino-DPRK friendship better and boost it.
					
					 A reception was also given at the DPRK consulate general in Shenyang on the same day.

articles.title: Foreign Guests Arrive
articles.content:
Foreign Guests Arrive
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the World Council of Churches led by its General Secretary Samuel Kobia and a friendship visiting group of the Chinese People's Liberation Army led by Lieut. General Gao Wusheng arrived here Saturday.

articles.title: New Sheetlet Issued
articles.content:
New Sheetlet Issued 
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) --  A new sheetlet has been published in the DPRK on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the founding of the People's Republic of China.
					 Printed on the sheetlet are the words "60th anniversary of the founding of the People's Republic of China" in Korean and Chinese and the national flag and emblem of the PRC.
					
					 The sheetlet includes stamps reflecting the oil painting showing President Hu Jintao, the Bird's Nest National Stadium where the opening and closing ceremonies of the 29th Olympic Games were held, the State Grand Theatre and others.

articles.title: WPK Inheriting Great History and Tradition
articles.content:
WPK Inheriting Great History and Tradition
Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- October 17 is the 27th anniversary of the publication of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's famous work "The Workers' Party of Korea Is a Juche-Type Revolutionary Party Which Inherited the Glorious Tradition of the DIU".
					 The army and people of the DPRK, with deep emotion, take this opportunity to look back upon the undying exploits of President      Kim Il Sung who provided the deep and strong root of the Party and the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il who has strengthened and developed the Workers' Party of Korea to be invincible revolutionary party by brilliantly carrying forward the tradition of the Down-with-Imperialism Union (DIU). 
					
					 Kim Jong Il, in the work, clarifies that the programme of the DIU became the basis of our Party's Programme, and the principle of independence advanced by this organization became the principle of our party building and activity and the communists of the new generation whom the DIU began to train, became the backbone in the establishment of our Party.
					
					 The WPK inheriting the glorious tradition of the DIU is a dignified revolutionary party upholding the banner of independence.
					
					 The WPK's idea and line of party building is the Juche-oriented ones and its slogan is also a revolutionary slogan "Let us live our own way!"
					
					 As the WPK has adopted the independent politics, the DPRK shines as a powerful socialist country that no one can pounce upon and the Korean people become a revolutionary people strong in self-respect. 
					
					 The WPK is an invincible revolutionary party winning victory after victory under the banner of Songun.
					
					 The programme of the DIU contains the idea of giving importance to arms that the armed enemy can be beat down only with arms. 
					
					 Its idea of Songun has been maintained firmly in the annals of the Korean revolution and applied fully to all fields of party and state activities by the Songun politics.
					
					 Kim Jong Il, basing himself on the President's Songun idea and Songun revolutionary leadership exploits, created the mode of Songun politics and formulated it as main mode of socialist politics.
					
					 Under the leadership of Kim Jong Il all the Korean army and people will advance forward more dynamically along the road of independence and Songun and carry to accomplishment the cause of building a great, prosperous and powerful socialist nation and the revolutionary cause of Juche.

articles.title: Model of Single-Minded Unity Created by DIU
articles.content:
Model of Single-Minded Unity Created by DIU
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- Today the Korean revolution is winning victory after victory with the single-minded unity in which the leader, the Party and the people form a harmonious whole.
					 This proud reality is unthinkable apart from the Down-with-Imperialism Union (DIU) which created the great model of the single-minded unity with the love and trust of the leader and the faith and fidelity of the soldiers.
					
					 The formation of the DIU 83 years ago provided the root of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and created the history of the single-minded unity, mighty weapon of the Songun revolution.
					
					 The DIU, formed with fresh and pure hot-blooded youth who were not infected by any old thoughts, put forth the unity as their lifeblood and was the first political organism which gave the origin to the unity and cohesion centered on the leader in the Songun revolution.
					
					 Charmed by the prominent greatness of President Kim Il Sung, the DIU's young revolutionaries of new generation constituted an organizational integral whole sharing destiny, intention and breath with him as the centre of the unity and the centre of leadership.
					
					 It was none other than vanguard revolutionary fighters of the DIU who composed the song of heart eulogizing the leader and fought true to their oath with the firm belief that the Korean revolution would certainly be crowned with victory under his leadership.
					
					 Under the grave situation in which the white terrorism of the Japanese imperialists stalked, the DIU protected the leader of the revolution at the cost of life, defended the unity like the apple of the eye and rallied the popular masses around the leader to strengthen the internal forces of the Songun revolution. This tradition became the ideological source of the single-minded unity of the WPK and the revolutionary ranks and the spiritual paragon for them.
					
					 By the ardent fighters educated and trained by the DIU, the tradition of the single-minded unity based on the revolutionary idea of the leader and united around him was established for the first time in the Korean revolution.
					
					 The Songun revolutionary ranks of Korea were formed with the young revolutionaries of the DIU as the nuclei and their spiritual world and fighting spirit were displayed to the full in the grim years of the Korean revolution.
					
					 The red flag flattering on the road of the Songun revolution is the banner of unity and comradeship which was handed down by the youth revolutionaries of the DIU and the revolutionary soldier spirit which brought about the dawn of a great, prosperous and powerful nation is the noble spirit of the times inheriting the revolutionary spirit of Mt. Paektu pioneered by the DIU.
					
					The entire army and all the people of the DPRK will rally close around General Secretary Kim Jong Il and energetically strive to bring earlier the day of a thriving nation with the tradition of the DIU which created the model of the single-minded unity of the Party and the revolutionary ranks as the eternal lifeline.

articles.title: Maneuver of U.S. and S. Korea Obstructive to Improvement of Inter-Korean Relations Flayed
articles.content:
Maneuver of U.S. and S. Korea Obstructive to Improvement of Inter-Korean Relations Flayed
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- A madcap "special naval operation exercise" had been staged for four days in the waters of the West Sea of south Korea since October 13 with the south Korean Navy and "George Washington", super-large nuclear powered carrier of the U.S. Navy, involved. This joint war maneuver comes under fire by signed commentaries of leading papers Saturday.
					 Rodong Sinmun observes: This saber rattling staged in the sea and air under the simulated conditions of "coping with someone's intrusion into coastal waters" was, in a nutshell, a desperate move of the bellicose forces at home and abroad to bring the inter-Korean relations back to the orbit of deterioration. 
					
					 It has become a trend of the situation surrounding the Korean Peninsula to settle problems through dialogue and cooperation, not by confrontation and pressure. It is needless to say that the above-said joint maneuver staged by the militaries of south Korea and the U.S in the West Sea is a deliberate provocation intended to hamstring the efforts to improve the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 The atmosphere of the process to improve the inter-Korean relations arranged with so much effort should be preserved and no one should be allowed to vitiate it and this environment is what the times and all Koreans desire, the daily notes, warning that it is ridiculous to stem the trend of the times while working hard to mislead the public opinion through such provocation. 
					
					 Minju Joson says that the bellicose forces of south Korea and the U.S. are leaving no means untried to derail the inter-Korean relations from the track of normalization but no force on earth can stem the trend of the times towards reconciliation and cooperation, peace and reunification.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Observed 
Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Saturday dedicates a signed article to the 27th anniversary of the publication of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "The Workers' Party of Korea Is a Juche-Type Revolutionary Party Which Inherited the Glorious Tradition of the DIU".
					 The work published on Oct. 17, Juche 71 (1982) clarifies the great significance of the formation of the Down-with-Imperialism Union (DIU) in the history of the WPK and the Korean revolution and the precious successes and experience gained in the building of the Juche-type revolutionary party and the invincible might and appearance of the WPK.
					
					 The WPK has demonstrated its invincible might, enjoying high dignity and prestige entirely because it has successfully carried forward the glorious history and tradition of the DIU under the leadership of Kim Jong Il, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The principle of independence laid down by the DIU serves as an ever-victorious signpost the WPK has steadfastly maintained generation after generation.
					
					 The tradition of the single-minded unity of the DIU serves as an everlasting invincible banner of the WPK.
					
					 The said tradition dating back to the days of the DIU serves as the most valuable treasure of the party and has been steadfastly carried forward in the stern years of the Korean revolution.
					
					 The blood ties with the popular masses provided by the DIU are a sure guarantee for the party building and activities.
					
					 The WPK forms a great harmonious whole with the people in which it serves them and they uphold its leadership with single-minded loyalty. Herein lies the source of the invincible might of the WPK.
					
					 The tradition of the DIU is a precious treasure of eternal value for the party and serves as an ever-victorious weapon for it in the struggle for successfully accomplishing the cause of building a great prosperous and powerful nation.

articles.title: Closer Cultural Cooperation between China and DPRK Called for
articles.content:
Closer Cultural Cooperation between China and DPRK Called for
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- The Sino-DPRK friendship is unbreakable as it stood all tests of history, said Wan Jiyuan, vice-general manager of the Center for Art Exhibition with Foreign Countries of Ministry of Culture in China who visited the DPRK.
					Recalling that President Kim Il Sung together with revolutionaries of the elder generation of China including Chairman Mao Zedong and Premier Zhou Enlai provided the friendly relations between the two countries, he referred to the fact that these relations have developed more favorably under the deep care of President Hu Jintao and General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The cultural exchange conducted between the two countries this year has injected fresh energy into the development of the Sino-DPRK friendly relations, he noted, adding: The cultural exchange between the two countries has gained in width and depth over the last six decades since the establishment of the Sino-DPRK diplomatic ties.
					
					 This year, "the year of Sino-DPRK friendship", Kim Jong Il made sure that the Opera "The Dream of the Red Chamber" and Drama "A Sentry under a Neon Lamp" were recreated and staged.
					
					 The above-said opera and drama could be successfully recreated thanks to Kim Jong Il who sets store by the development of the bilateral friendly relations.
					
					 While watching the Opera "The Dream of the Red Chamber" we were deeply impressed by the outstanding artistic gift and extraordinary wisdom of the peerlessly great man and the Korean people's friendly feelings towards the Chinese people and talents of the performers. 
					
					 The cultural cooperation between the two countries will become more brisk.

articles.title: Korean People's Cause of National Reunification Supported in Pakistan
articles.content:
Korean People's Cause of National Reunification Supported in Pakistan
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- The Punjab Provincial Committee of the National Workers' Party of Pakistan, the Afro-Asian People's Solidarity Organization, the Peasants Committee and the Trade Union Federation of Pakistan, the Lahore Branch of the Pakistan-Korea Friendship Association and the Pakistan Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification issued a joint statement on Oct. 8 in support of the Korean people's cause of national reunification.
					 The statement noted that the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo and the 10-point programme for the great unity of the whole nation clarified by President Kim Il Sung are commanding unanimous support from all the Korean people and the world peace-loving people as they are the most realistic and reasonable proposals for achieving national reunification.
					
					 The statement extended full support to the Korean people in their efforts to achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country under the leadership of Kim Jong Il and demanded the U.S. withdraw at once its WMDs including nuclear weapons and its forces from south Korea, replace the Armistice Agreement with a peace accord and stop interfering in the internal affairs of the DPRK.

articles.title: Joint Seminar on WPK's Experience in Party Building Held in UK
articles.content:
Joint Seminar on WPK's Experience in Party Building Held in UK
Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- A joint seminar on the experience gained by the Workers' Party of Korea in the party building was held in London on October 8 on the occasions of the 64th anniversary of the founding of the WPK and the 83rd anniversary of the formation of the Down-with-Imperialism Union.
					 Displayed in the venue of the seminar were photos on the feats performed by the peerlessly great persons in building and leading the party and photos on the path of victory and glory covered by  the WPK.
					
					The floor was taken by Harpal Brar, chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Great Britain (Marxist-Leninist), Andy Brooks, general secretary of the Central Committee of the New Communist Party of Britain, Dermot Hudson, chairman of the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, Keith Bennet, deputy director-general of the European Society for the Study of the Juche Idea, and others.
					
					All of them highly praised General Secretary Kim Jong Il for having strengthened and developed the WPK founded by President Kim Il Sung into a Juche-oriented revolutionary party and brought about a turning phase in the building of a thriving nation and the cause of national reunification with his indefatigable Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					 They stressed that it is only the WPK which fully ensured the undisputed authority and prestige of the leader in the party building and activities and achieved the steel-strong unity and cohesion based on the idea and steersmanship of the leader.
					
					 Recalling that under the leadership of the WPK the Korean people have worked miracles of the century while frustrating the imperialist allied forces' every move against the DPRK, they pointed out that the invincible WPK having a solid mass foundation has victoriously led the popular masses' cause of independence, undeterred by any adversity and tempest. 
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the seminar.
					
					 Attending the seminar were members of the Communist Party of Great Britain (Marxist－Leninist), the Revolutionary Communist Party of Britain (Marxist－Leninist), the New Communist Party of Britain, the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the Coordinating Committee of Friends of Korea, and other political parties and organizations and the European Society for the Study of the Juche Idea and masses.

articles.title: WPK Birthday Observed in Czech Republic
articles.content:
WPK Birthday Observed in Czech Republic
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- The Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association and the Czech Group for the Study and Materialization of the Juche Idea jointly published bulletin No. 6 on Oct. 9 on the occasion of the 64th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The bulletin in an article said that the WPK is a party with perfect mass foundation, adding that President Kim Il Sung built the WPK into the one with its roots struck deep among the broad masses.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The popular masses' absolute trust and support to the party were an important factor of working such historic miracle as the DPRK's defeat of the U.S. which was superior to it in the numerical strength and in terms of military technique in the last Korean war.
					
					 The WPK could enjoy such absolute support and trust from the people because it embodied the Juche idea which calls for regarding the popular masses as the most precious and powerful beings in the world.
					
					 The maxim of the President that one always wins victory when one trusts and depends upon people but is bound to always suffer a defeat when forsaken by them has become the motto of the party. It deems it a duty to exist for the sake of the people and struggle to meet their interests and considers it as the supreme principle of its activities to steadily improve the standard of people's living.
					
					 That is why the Korean people call the WPK a mother party and turn out as one to implement its line and policies, entirely entrusting their destiny to it. 
					
					 The WPK having a rock-firm mass foundation amid the absolute trust of the people will victoriously advance its cause, undeterred by any political upheaval in the world.

articles.title: WPK Birthday Celebrated in Different Countries
articles.content:
WPK Birthday Celebrated in Different Countries 
 Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- Meetings were held in Nepal, Finland and Peru from Oct. 6 to 8 to celebrate the 64th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Speeches were made at the meetings.
					
					 C. P. Mainali, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Nepal Communist Party (Marxist-Leninist), said that President Kim Il Sung, the great sun, founded the WPK and led the Korean revolution to victory, thus performing great exploits for the Korean revolution and the world revolution.
					
					Noting that General Secretary Kim Jong Il has victoriously led the Korean revolution with his unique Songun politics, frustrating all the moves of the imperialists and reactionaries, he expressed belief that the WPK and the Korean people would surely open the gate to a thriving nation in 2012, the centenary of birth of the President.
					
					 The minister of Land Reform and Management of the government of Nepal said that the WPK is a great party that set an example to be followed by the world by performing great exploits in the van of the struggle for accomplishing the anti-imperialist cause and the cause of socialism for a long period from the very day of its founding. Many other political parties and people are learning a lot from the exploits and experience of the WPK, he added.
					
					Antti Sika-Aho, chairman of the Finland-Korea Society, noted that the WPK has victoriously advanced socialist construction, adhering to the idea of the President and ensuring the unitary leadership and has grown strong to be the most powerful party in the world.
					
					 Messages of greetings to Kim Jong Il were adopted at the meetings.

articles.title: Corea: emitido nuevo sello por efemeride china
articles.content:
Corea: emitido nuevo sello por efemeride china
Pyongyang, 17 de octubre (ATCC) -- Recientemente, fue emitido en Corea el papel enterizo dedicado al 60o aniversario de la fundacion de la Republica Popular China.
					  Esta anotada ahi en coreano y chino la frase "El 60o aniversario de la fundacion de la Republica Popular China" y se ven la bandera y el escudo nacionales de este pais asiatico.
					
					  Entre los sellos componentes del papel enterizo figuran los que contienen el retrato al oleo del presidente chino Hu Jintao, el estadio donde tuvieron lugar la ceremonia inaugural y la de clausura de los XXIX Juegos Olimpicos, el Gran Teatro Estatal, etc.

articles.title: PTC continua la historia y tradicion de la "UDI"
articles.content:
PTC continua la historia y tradicion de la "UDI"
Pyongyang, 17 de octubre (ATCC) -- Hoy se cumple el 27o aniversario de la publicacion de la obra maestra del Dirigente Kim Jong Il "El Partido del Trabajo de Corea es un partido revolucionario de tipo jucheano, heredero de las gloriosas tradiciones de la UDI".
					  En ocasion de esa efemeride, el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea sienten en lo profundo del corazon la sabia orientacion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, quien fortalecio el PTC como invencible partido revolucionario al dar firme continuidad a las inmortales hazanas del Presidente Kim Il Sung, quien habia sentado la profunda y robusta raiz del partido, y a la tradicion de la Union para Derrotar al Imperialismo ("UDI").
					
					  En su obra el Dirigente enseno que el programa de la "UDI" devino la base de la plataforma de nuestro partido, el principio de independencia presentado por ella ha sido lo mismo en la construccion y actividades del partido y los comunistas de nueva generacion formados por esa organizacion se hicieron pilares en la fundacion de nuestro partido.
					
					  El PTC, heredero de la gloriosa tradicion de la "UDI", es el digno partido revolucionario que avanza enarbolando la bandera de independencia.
					
					  Hoy en dia, el mantiene la autoctona idea y linea acerca de la construccion del partido y marcha bajo la consigna revolucionaria "!Vivamos a nuestro estilo!"
					
					  Gracias a la politica independiente del PTC, la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea brilla como intocable potencia socialista y el pueblo coreano, como el  revolucionario con fuerte dignidad nacional.
					
					  El PTC es el invencible partido revolucionario que sale siempre victorioso bajo la bandera del Songun (priorizacion militar).
					
					  El programa de la "UDI" abarca la idea de dar importancia a las fuerzas armadas, segun la cual se puede derrotar solo con las armas a los imperialistas japoneses armados.
					
					  El ideal del Songun presentado por ella se ha mantenido con firmeza en todos los anales de la revolucion coreana y se materializa globalmente en todos los dominios de las actividades del partido y el Estado en virtud de la politica de Songun. 
					
					  Basandose en la idea del Songun del Presidente y sus proezas logradas en la direccion sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun, el Dirigente creo el modo politico de igual nombre y lo formulo como el principal de la politica socialista.
					
					  El ejercito y el pueblo de Corea avanzaran con mas vigor por el camino de la independencia y el Songun bajo la direccion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il y llevaran a feliz termino la construccion de una gran potencia prospera socialista y la causa revolucionaria del Juche.

articles.title: Periodicos condenan ejercicio maritimo Sur de Corea-EE.UU.
articles.content:
Periodicos condenan ejercicio maritimo Sur de Corea-EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 17 de octubre (ATCC) -- En sendos comentarios individuales del dia 17, los periodicos capitalinos condenaron el "ejercicio de operacion especial maritima" que se realizo de manera frenetica a partir del pasado dia 13 en las aguas del Mar Oeste de Corea, que pertenecen a la parte surcoreana, con la participacion de las fuerzas navales surcoreanas y el portaaviones de propulsion nuclear de tamano supergrande "George Washington" de las fuerzas navales de Estados Unidos.
					  En una palabra, este simulacro militar conjunto, que se libro durante 4 dias en el mar y el cielo suponiendo la "penetracion por el mar" de alguien, deviene una maniobra desesperada de las fuerzas belicistas internas y externas para volver a empeorar las relaciones Norte-Sur.
					
					  Asi senala el comentarista del periodico Rodong Sinmun y continua:
					
					  Ahora, la solucion del problema mediante el dialogo y la cooperacion sin recurrir al enfrentamiento y la presion deviene la corriente de la epoca en torno a la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					  Por lo tanto, el reciente ejercicio militar conjunto en el Mar Oeste de Corea deviene el intencional acto provocativo para frenar la mejora de las relaciones Norte-Sur de Corea.
					
					  El ambiente de la mejora de dichas relaciones, preparado a costa de tantos esfuerzos, no debe ser danado sino fomentado de continuo. Esto es la demanda de la epoca y la aspiracion de todos los coreanos.
					
					  Resultara absurdo el intento de invertir la corriente de la epoca induciendo en error la opinion publica mediante actos provocativos.
					
					  El periodico Minju Joson enfatiza que aunque las fuerzas belicistas del Sur de Corea y EE.UU. se valen de todos los medios y metodos para volver a llevar al empeoramiento las relaciones Norte-Sur que entraron en el camino de normalizacion, no podran detener por nada la corriente de la epoca hacia la reconciliacion, la colaboracion, la paz y la reunificacion.

articles.title: Editado en Checo boletin por efemeride coreana
articles.content:
Editado en Checo boletin por efemeride coreana 
Pyongyang, 17 de octubre (ATCC) -- Con motivo del 64o aniversario de la fundacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, la Asociacion de Amistad Checo-Corea Paektusan y el Grupo Checo para el Estudio y Materializacion de la Idea Juche hicieron publica el dia 9 en conjunto el boletin no. 6.
					  Un articulo insertado en el senala que el PTC es el partido que tiene su perfecto terreno entre las masas y destaca que el Presidente Kim Il Sung lo construyo como agrupacion politica arraigada profundamente en amplias masas. 
					
					  En la pasada guerra coreana, Corea vencio a EE.UU. con superioridad numerica y tecnico-militar, apunta y agrega que influyeron mucho en este milagro historico la absoluta confianza y apoyo de las masas populares al partido.
					
					  El PTC cuenta con la absoluta confianza y apoyo del pueblo porque ha materializado la idea Juche, que considera a las masas populares como ente mas valioso y poderoso del mundo, asevera y prosigue:
					
					  El PTC toma por su lema la maxima del Presidente Kim Il Sung: "si confian y se apoyan en el pueblo, llegan a salir siempre victoriosos, pero si son repudiados por el, sufren mil derrotas". 
					
					  Y considera como su deber existir por el pueblo y luchar por sus intereses, y como el maximo principio de sus actividades, mejorar constantemente la vida del pueblo. 
					
					  Por esta razon, el pueblo coreano llama al PTC como partido madre, le confia su destino y lucha unanimemente por materializar las lineas y la politica de aquel. 
					
					  El PTC impulsara victoriosamente su causa sin vacilacion alguna ante cualesquier fluctuaciones politicas del mundo.
